name: overgrow

effect.black-white: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
effect.black-2-white-2: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

short_effect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.black-white: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.
